Package gchess.chess

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • gchess.boardgame.Board<ChessPiece>
      • gchess.chess.ChessBoard

  • public class ChessBoard
extends Board<ChessPiece>

    Chess Board

    This class helps implementing moves of pieces in a chess game. Note: The board is not responsible for any move executions, it only saves data about the board state.
    Since:
    2018-04-23
